item.title: Episode 1 - Wed Jan 21 2026
item.description: Top Stories for Wed Jan 21 2026 Here are the links for the stories: 1. https://www.ommcomnews.com/world-news/catholic-bishops-question-moral-foundations-of-us-foreign-policy 2. https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/256608/pope-leo-xiv-meets-fssp-leaders-amid-visitation-traditionis-custodes-fallout 3. https://www.ewtnnews.com/spain-train-accident-pastoral-care-catholic-church-256606 4. https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/256609/pope-leo-xiv-urges-faithful-to-rediscover-the-beauty-of-charity 5. https://www.catholicnewsagency.com/news/256610/pope-leo-to-celebrate-holy-thursday-mass-at-st-john-lateran-after-hiatus-under-pope-francis
